testcase.name: User is able to create New Account in the Salesforce Scenario
testcase.system-out: Given User will Open Salesforce Website.....................................passed When verify title for the Salesforce page...................................passed Then user will enter "vedant.jagani@campingworld.com.test" and "Welcome2019*".passed And user click the login button............................................passed And verify title for the Salesforce Home page...............................passed Then user will click on the waffle icon.....................................passed Then user will navigate to the Search field and search for the Account......passed
